column3: Russian: Денау / Denau) is a town in Surxondaryo Region of Uzbekistan
column4: the administrative center of Denov District.

column1: In 2009 the town population was listed as 104
column2: 400 persons. Denov's economy revolves around cross-border trade with Tajikistan and agriculture from the surrounding hinterland.

column1: The Russian name of the city is Denau.
